Articles.Content:
Hitching a ride back from Minmus. Why go through all the trouble twice, when you can just karpool with your buddy and play some kards or listen to musik?

Edited January 6, 2016 by Jimbodiah
Zpelink

Play cards? I just got an idea for a new Matt Damon film: He's on a spaceship on its way to Mars, when the crew starts playing Monopoly. Matt now has to survive and await rescue as his friends go into Monopoly rage.
